front.title: IAB and IESG Selection, Confirmation, and Recall Process: Operation of the Nominating and Recall Committees
front.abstract: The process by which the members of the IAB and IESG are selected, confirmed, and recalled is specified. This document is a self-consistent, organized compilation of the process as it was known at the time of publication. This document specifies an Internet Best Current Practices for the Internet Community, and requests discussion and suggestions for improvements.
